titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on magnesium aluminum hydroxide carbonate hydrate.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on magnesium aluminum hydroxide carbonate hydrate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2008, of the duty on magnesium aluminum hydroxide carbonate hydrate.
